name: repetition_1
description: ### Requirements: - You must be able to create Books and Authors`201` - Get a list of books and one by author`200`     - * Get a list of books based on author     - * Get a list of books based on one of it's genres     - ** Get a list of books, sorted by publish-year - Get one book based on ID `200`     - If it doesen't exist `404` - Update books/authors `200`     - If it doesen't exist `404`     - Borrow book / return book `200`         - decrement the number of books available         - If 0, don't accept the request to borrow the book     - ** If the name of the author is changed, change it so that it is correct in all the author's books - Delete books/authors `204 eller 200`     - If it doesn't exist `404`     - ** if author is removed remove all its books - * When a book or author is created / updated, it must be validated so that only valid data is entered `400`
